00046   class ClientKeepaliveHandler : public DispatchHandler {
00047 
00048   public:
00049     ClientKeepaliveHandler(Comm *comm, PropertiesPtr &props, Session *session);
00050 
00051     virtual void handle(Hypertable::EventPtr &event_ptr);
00052 
00053     void register_handle(ClientHandleStatePtr &handle_state) {
00054       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00055       HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle_state->handle);
00056       assert(iter == m_handle_map.end());
00057       m_handle_map[handle_state->handle] = handle_state;
00058     }
00059 
00060     void unregister_handle(uint64_t handle) {
00061       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00062       m_handle_map.erase(handle);
00063     }
00064 
00065     bool get_handle_state(uint64_t handle, ClientHandleStatePtr &handle_state) {
00066       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00067       HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle);
00068       if (iter == m_handle_map.end())
00069         return false;
00070       handle_state = (*iter).second;
00071       return true;
00072     }
00073 
00074     void expire_session();
00075 
00076     void destroy_session();
00077 
00078   private:
00079     boost::mutex       m_mutex;
00080     boost::xtime       m_last_keep_alive_send_time;
00081     boost::xtime       m_jeopardy_time;
00082     bool m_dead;
00083     Comm *m_comm;
00084     uint32_t m_lease_interval;
00085     uint32_t m_keep_alive_interval;
00086     struct sockaddr_in m_master_addr;
00087     struct sockaddr_in m_local_addr;
00088     bool m_verbose;
00089     Session *m_session;
00090     uint64_t m_session_id;
00091     ClientConnectionHandlerPtr m_conn_handler_ptr;
00092     uint64_t m_last_known_event;
00093 
00094     typedef hash_map<uint64_t, ClientHandleStatePtr> HandleMap;
00095     HandleMap  m_handle_map;
00096   };
00097   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<ClientKeepaliveHandler> ClientKeepaliveHandlerPtr;
